sentences.en: Brett is enjoying a honeymoon period with both press and public.
sentences.cn: 布雷特和报界及公众之间都正处在蜜月期。

sentences.en: Dora returned from her honeymoon deliriously happy.
sentences.cn: 多拉度完蜜月回来幸福洋溢。

sentences.en: I loved that place when we went on our honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 当初我们度蜜月时我便很喜欢那个地方.

sentences.en: I suggest Paris as a good place for a honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 我提议去巴黎,那是度蜜月的好去处.

sentences.en: Our honeymoon was two days in Las Vegas at a luxurious hotel called Le Mirage.
sentences.cn: 我们的蜜月是在拉斯维加斯一家名为“海市蜃楼”的豪华酒店住了两天。

sentences.en: She bought a black nightie to wear on her honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 她买了一件黑色睡衣准备在蜜月时穿.

sentences.en: She buy a black nightie to wear on her honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 她买了一件黑色睡衣准备在蜜月时穿。

sentences.en: The happy pair are leaving for their honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 这幸福的一对就要去度蜜月了.

sentences.en: The honeymoon between Congress and the President was over.
sentences.cn: 国会与总统的和谐关系已过去了.

sentences.en: There was always a honeymoon period when Mum started a new job.
sentences.cn: 妈妈每开始一份新工作总会有一阵儿新鲜劲.

sentences.en: They were in a state of bliss during the honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 他们在蜜月期间幸福无比.

sentences.en: We went to Italy on our honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 我们去了意大利度蜜月。

sentences.en: We went to Venice for our honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 我们去威尼斯度的蜜月。

sentences.en: While on honeymoon in Bali, she learned to scuba dive.
sentences.cn: 她在巴厘岛度蜜月时学会了带水肺潜水.

trans.tran_cn: 蜜月，蜜月期，蜜月旅行，短暂的和谐时期
trans.tran_en: a holiday taken by two people who have just got married
to go somewhere for your honeymoon
